short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Guardian's Australia edition about news, sport and opinion

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
All Australian news from The Guardian Australia in one browser extension. The News Notifier will inform you when a new story, news or events are published in The Guardian Australia.

Stay online, stay focused and be informed with our Notifier. All news in one tool:
•	Australian Politics
•	Climate and Environment
•	Indigenous Affairs
•	Human Rights and Social Justice
•	Health
•	Business and Economy
•	Culture and Arts
•	Sports
•	Technology and Science
•	World News
•	Opinion and Editorials
•	Investigative Journalism

Only high-quality journalism tailored to Australian audiences
